CURRENCY.EASY_CONDUCT_ECONOMIC_ACTIVITIES: It is easy to conduct foreign economic activities together with the FUIB services. Documentary relations with the Bank are simplified and currency exchange can be done through Viber
CURRENCY.CHECK_CURRENCY_CONTRACT: Check your currency contract and get recommendations according to currency laws
CURRENCY.CONSULT_CURRENCY_TRANSACTIONS: Consult on currency transactions: export / import, purchase / sale, foreign currency translation / write-off, and non-standard currency law issues
CURRENCY.USE_SERVICES: Use fast-paced decision-making services to review and negotiate a foreign economic contract with a complete package of documents
CURRENCY.FAST_TRACK_IT: Fast track is the purchase and transfer of counterparty currency within one banking day.
CURRENCY.STAY_UP_TO_DATE_ON_THE_TREND: Stay up to date on the trend of currency quotes
CURRENCY.GET_INFORMATION_FROM_BANK: Receive up-to-date information from the Bank promptly and free of charge via Viber on changes in the market rates at the Bank, at which foreign currency trading applications can be satisfied and buy / sell
CURRENCY.GET_CASH_IN_YOUR_ACCOUNT: Receive cash on your current account immediately upon reconciliation
CURRENCY.GET_EXCLUSIVE_MARKET_CONDITIONS: Get exclusive market conditions for the small business segment
CURRENCY.THE_HIGHER_YOUR_SALES: The higher your sales / sales turnover over the past month, the better the rate is given to you automatically

CONTENT.CHECK_ZED_CONTRACTS: Check foreign trade contracts and provide clarifications on conducting foreign exchange operations as part of the Consulting service
CONTENT.CURRENCY_PURCHASE_TRANSFER: Purchase and translation of currency to the counterparty within one banking day
CONTENT.MATCH_CURRENCY: Coordinate the exchange rate through Viber and immediately get money into the account
CONTENT.HIGHER_CURRENCY_BUYING: The greater the turnover of purchases / sales of currency, the more favorable the rate
